mapper.select:
select count(1) from LEAVE_MESSAGE l
order by l.CREATE_DATE desc

select
from LEAVE_MESSAGE where PARENT_ID is null

select l.ID as id, l.CITY_CODE as cityCode, l.PARENT_ID as parentId, l.WORD_AUTHOR_ID as wordAuthorId, l.WORD_MASTER_ID as wordMasterId, l.MSG_CONTENT as msgContent, l.CREATE_DATE as createDate, l.AREA_CODE as areaCode, b.BASE_NAME as areaName, (select USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO where USER_NO = l.WORD_AUTHOR_ID) as wordAuthorName, (select USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO where USER_NO = l.WORD_MASTER_ID) as wordMasterName from LEAVE_MESSAGE l left join BASE_DETAIL b on l.AREA_CODE = b.ID WHERE 1=1 AND l.DEL_FLAG = 0 and l.PARENT_ID is not null

select l.ID as id, l.CITY_CODE as cityCode, l.PARENT_ID as parentId, l.WORD_AUTHOR_ID as wordAuthorId, l.WORD_MASTER_ID as wordMasterId, l.MSG_CONTENT as msgContent, l.CREATE_DATE as createDate, l.AREA_CODE as areaCode, b.BASE_NAME as areaName, (select USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO where USER_NO = l.WORD_AUTHOR_ID) as wordAuthorName, (select USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO where USER_NO = l.WORD_MASTER_ID) as wordMasterName from LEAVE_MESSAGE l left join BASE_DETAIL b on l.AREA_CODE = b.ID WHERE 1=1 AND l.DEL_FLAG = 0 and l.WORD_MASTER_ID = 'JYJD202011111' ORDER BY l.CREATE_DATE DESC LIMIT #{page.pageNum},#{page.pageSize}
select count(1) from LEAVE_MESSAGE l left join BASE_DETAIL b on l.AREA_CODE = b.ID WHERE 1=1 AND l.DEL_FLAG = 0 and l.WORD_MASTER_ID = 'JYJD202011111'
mapper.sql:
WHERE 1=1 AND l.DEL_FLAG = 0 and l.PARENT_ID is null
and l.AREA_CODE = #{page.data.cityCode}
mapper.select:

ORDER BY l.CREATE_DATE DESC LIMIT #{page.pageNum},#{page.pageSize}
